body:
This issue is not created using [issue template](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-issue-helper/) so I'm going to close it. 🙊
Sorry for this, but it helps save our maintainers' time so that more developers get helped.
Feel free to create another issue using the issue template.

这个 issue 未使用 [issue 模板](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-issue-helper/?lang=zh-cn) 创建，所以我将关闭此 issue。
为此带来的麻烦我深表歉意，但是请理解这是为了节约社区维护者的时间，以更高效地服务社区的开发者群体。
如果您愿意，可以请使用 issue 模板重新创建 issue。
我在使用ThemeRiver的时候，使用了一个自定义的数据集，但是数据集中有一部分只有一个时间点的数据，但是在ThemeRiver图形上显示的时候不仅这个时间点的画出了图形，这个数据在别的时间点也画出了图形，比如：[4,29,'雀斑']，这个数据在 2，3 时间点都有图形，这个是bug还是什么呢？

@Ovilia if this is confirmed as a bug, when can we expect to have this fix available in a release ? We are currently looking at either rewriting our own zoomable chart or using one of the other third-party chart libraries. If this is indeed a bug and if the fix will come soon enough, it will make our decision easy.
There is no `toolbox.feature.dataZoom.fillerColor`. And `dataZoom.fillerColor` is worked for this part: I didn't find an option for your requirement.
gps坐标直接放入会有偏移情况，是否需要转化坐标？

”circle在图表上，ondrag事件失效“是什么意思。
超出范围后，Circle看不见但还能拖的设定……有点迷……但想想好像也没有更好的方式，难道直接让它消失么？

splitNumber 是预估值，参见 https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#yAxis.splitNumber
可以使用 [https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#yAxis.axisLabel.showMaxLabel](showMaxLabel) 强制显示最大值。
不确定这算不算 bug，柱状图堆叠折线图感觉很奇怪，会给读者带来误解，有什么场景需要这样的设定吗？

@Ovilia 
https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xcry0B7TcB&v=5
这是例子，拖动 circle 时鼠标超出图表，此时松开鼠标，circle 停在图表边缘，ondrag 失效。
是因为 graphic.position 数据错误引发的吗，应该怎样限制 position 的值
这个需求确实很奇怪，不过我觉得要么就不支持这样设置，如果支持就应该是正确的显示，目前来说是支持的，但是在某些特殊情况下会出错，应该就算bug了吧
Oh got it. But how could i change the color in my Area-dataZoom demo above？
`lineHeight:'40'` 应为 `lineHeight:40`
As I said, I didn't find an option for your requirement. Maybe you should try changing the source code.
目前是不支持的（不能按有些情况正好符合预期就认为是支持的），如果需要这个功能，还请解释下什么场景下需要。
不太清楚，您可能需要调试下 ECharts 源码，我也不太了解这块的。
人工智能编程这是~我倒不是需要这个功能，只是偶尔发现了，以为是bug，如果不是bug就打扰了
It may not be fixed quickly. And our release period is about 3 months.

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

官网无法下载
@segmafrontend 好的，那我先关闭了。谢谢反馈！
markLine 是 canvas 绘制的，而不是 DOM 节点，所以这个功能一般来说没法支持。
This issue is closed due to not being active. Please feel free to open it again (for the author) or create a new one and reference this (for others) if you have further questions.

> markLine是canvas绘制的，而不是DOM节点，所以这个功能一般来说没法支持。

之前通过 symbol 引用自定义的svg来实现的，但是在控制symbol的位置的时候不是很方便。那能否可以有类似的选项可以控制？
多谢女神解答💐
This issue is closed due to not being active. Please feel free to open it again (for the author) or create a new one and reference this (for others) if you have further questions.

即使是使用 SVG，也是不建议自己操作 DOM 节点的，因为这会使得 ECharts 的行为变得不可控。
目前看起来并没有更好的解决方案。
I cannot reproduce the error with the option provided. It should be a problem of your own environment, which I'm afraid I could not offer any help.

Thanks for your reply. Can you please suggest a recommended webpack
configuration. I tried looking up on Google/SO but could not find anything
relevant?


On Fri, 19 Apr, 2019, 10:56 AM Ovilia, <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I cannot reproduce the error with the option provided. It should be a
> problem of your own environment, which I'm afraid I could not offer any
> help.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/10153#issuecomment-484771265>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AED2XVD3WLI4SOAEPBAISVLPRFJXDANCNFSM4HATSRRA>
> .
>
I've made the changes based on your feedback. @Ovilia can you review again?

同求
@yihoo  可以在初始化 echarts.init 的时候设置 devicePixelRatio
Actually this is a bug from zrender, I have opened a PR https://github.com/ecomfe/zrender/pull/458

Currently, if using NotMerge mode, you have to get the current state of dataZoom by `chart.getOption`.
We should provide more detailed settings in `chart.setOption` to enable customize which chart/component will be merged and which will not.
有一个比较繁琐的迂回方法，新加一个 x 轴在顶上，新加另一个 line series 在这个 x 轴上，设置上 `areaStyle: {color: '#fff'}` 从而能遮盖住上半部分的 markArea。

Before the inside radius supported on polar, we have a workaround:
<https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xJzZu1Q1ri&v=2>
set [xAxis.triggerEvent](https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#xAxis.triggerEvent) as `true` and listen to the click event of the chart.

> 
> 
> 4.2.0-rc.1 支持开启缩放

开启缩放后，再进行一些点击节点操作后，再次点击根节点会出现tree图消失的问题！！！

![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18117106/56637134-788e4880-669d-11e9-88a6-bccb28673063.png)
进行移动或放大缩小操作后
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18117106/56637184-95c31700-669d-11e9-84cb-e0f30fa38fec.png)
可以配合xAxis和yAxis的interval进行配置

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵
